Name: Saifurra
description:
This woman is Saifurra. She is 41 years old. She is a resident of A. Jomi. Saifurra lives in this place with her husband and children. Her husband is engaged in the farming business. Saifurra herself also wants to engage in this type of business. Her husband has prepared the land and now she intends to purchase fertilisers for growing new crops.

Saifurra does not have money to purchase seeds and fertilisers, and thus for this reason she has applied for a loan, in order to purchase seeds and fertilisers to start planting her crops earlier. She needs your help.
